updates.title: Bigger Banners
updates.desc: Banners now stretch all the way to the edges of the screen.

updates.title: Clearer Titles
updates.desc: Page titles are now easier to read with darker backgrounds.

updates.title: Announcements Page
updates.desc: New page to see the latest news and updates.

updates.title: Version Label
updates.desc: See 'Alpha' in the top left so you know what version you're using.

updates.title: Dark Menu Bar
updates.desc: New dark top menu with a sleek look.

updates.title: Smoother Animations
updates.desc: Cards move and change more smoothly when you interact with them.

updates.title: New Colors
updates.desc: Added purple to our orange and blue colors for a better look.
